A peasant who wears a dark green-colored tunic. {| border="0" |- !width=7%|Map!!width=14%|Name!!width=76%|Notes |- | MAP02/33 || {{dw|Irale}} || Sells weapons once you've joined the Front. |- | MAP23 || {{dw|Richter}} || Main operator of the front, can be the leader (depends on player's choice). |} ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Peasant13 : {{Class|Peasant}} { {{Property|Translation}} 3 }
